info.description: Implements the Mailio server based on https://mirs.mail.io/ specifications
info.title: Mailio Server API

get.description: Retruns a list of VCs by mailio address
get.summary: List all VCs for a specific mailio address

get.description: Returns a single verifiable credential by id

post.description: Checks if signature is valid and returns a boolean object

parameters.description: Reference ID (request ID, could be anything)
parameters.name: requestId

get.summary: Find user by base64 scrypt email address

parameters.description: Base64 formatted Scrypt of email address
parameters.name: email

get.description: Lookup handshake is public and looksup handshake by ownerAddress and sender scrypted (hashed) address or mailio address. If nothing found default server handshake returned
get.summary: Lookup handshake by ownerAddress and sender scrypted (hashed) address (or mailio address)

parameters.description: Senders scrypt address or Mailio address
parameters.name: senderAddress

get.description: Returns a single handshake by id

403.description: Failed to login (valid signature, no valid VC)

post.summary: Request handshake from server (digitally signed) if missing in local database

get.description: Returns a nonce which client needs to sign with their private key
Get logged in users basic information
Returns users DID document based on mailio address

code.description: Code is the HTTP status code

userPermissions.description: optional list of permissions specific to a target application

ownerAddress.description: mailio address of the owner of the handshake

ownerPublicKey.description: owner public key of the owner of the handshake

sender.description: senders scrypted email address or mailio address + contact information

address.description: senders scrypted email address or mailio address

senderDomain.description: origin of the request (where DNS is published with Mailio public key)

ed25519SigningPublicKeyBase64.description: public key of the private key used to sign the nonce

databasePassword.description: this is a password for couchdbs private user database

ed25519SigningPublicKeyBase64.description: public key of the private key used to sign the nonce
